t: Peebles, Ann - Brand New Classics - Amazon.com Music
s: When I ordered this album I wasn't sure I would like it. I am an old fan of Ann Peebles and was of the opinion that if a song was already a standard then why change the arrangements. Can you better a classic track ? The answer is yes and no, While the original tracks are brilliant so are this ...

t: Amazon.com: Straight From The Heart: CDs & Vinyl
s: Vinyl LP repressing. If Al Green is heads on the Hi Records coin, Ann Peebles is tails. The signature female artist on the legendary Memphis soul and R&B label, Ann Peebles rocked the pre-disco 70's with songs of love, lost love, and love straight up taken.
